link.description: For the standard PI System product features it is also possible share a view with a colleague, if security and permission allow for the web page sharing. Information can be real-time data collected in the PI System, configuration parameters and asset meta-data, documentation (pdf, images, etc..) or contextualized links to resources on other systems (SAP, etc.) Several PI Widgets from e-matica are available and more will be developed. Have a PI Vision graphical integration need? Just ask e-matica and you'll be all set!
